thread.title: 'Punyalan Agarbatties gave me confidence’
thread.title_full: 'Punyalan Agarbatties gave me confidence’ - The Times of India

author: Sanjith Sidhardhan
title: 'Punyalan Agarbatties gave me confidence’
text:
Jayasurya's next production Su... Su... Sudhi Vathmeekam has already garnered enough hype after the launch of its trailer. However, the actor tells us that he might not have attempted the film if his earlier venture Punyalan Agarbatties had tanked.
The success of Punyalan Agarbatties gave me confidence and that's one of the main reason why he teamed up with director Ranjith Sankar again for their upcoming movie, he says.
Su... Su... Sudhi Vathmeekam tells the story of a man who stammers and how he overcomes it. The movie also has Jayasurya teaming up with Aju Varghese.
